author: mariohavel
content: I checked CLs I am running and any of those have archive mode :/ I resynced a Lighthouse instance with option to reconstruct historical states but it can take few days, I will let you know

author: mariohavel
content:
Hey, cohort is opened to anyone but note that it is closed to end, there will be only last two office hours calls. You can checked recordings from previous ones in pinned message here. To receive updates on future cohorts, check this channel and you can also join a mailing list https://groups.google.com/a/ethereum.org/forum/#!forum/protocol-fellowship-group/join

Regarding the project you are asking about, there is a similar project https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/blob/master/projects/eth-monitor.md

author: mariohavel
content: <@&857649635274915900> Standup starting in 15 minutes! Join the last standup call of cohort three. Link: https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-standup
